headline: EMEA Data Center Colocation Market Forecast Report 2025-2030, Profiling Equinix, Iron Mountain, Hostdime, Nforce Entertainment, Altushost, Serverius, Telehouse, Verizon, and Centersquare
summary: The EMEA data center colocation market is set to expand from USD 29.751 billion in 2025 to USD 51.208 billion in 2030, driven by hyperscale demand and rapid digital transformation. Key insights include hyperscale growth, investments in digital infrastructure, and sustainable energy initiatives. Discover regional trends, strategic expansions, and future market dynamics that shape this rapidly growing sector. Explore how leading players like Equinix and Khazna are meeting evolving demands with sca

headline: Canada Existing & Upcoming Data Center Database 2025 | EStruxture Data Centers, Cologix, Vantage Data Centers and Equinix are Some of the Leading Data Center Operators by Capacity
summary: Explore the comprehensive database product offering an in-depth analysis of the Canada data center market. Understand the profiles of 116 existing and 19 upcoming data centers across major cities like Toronto, Montreal, and Vancouver. Gain insights into existing and future white-floor space, IT load capacities, and pricing models for retail and wholesale colocation. Key highlights include Calgary's leading role in future power capacity and Microsoft's ongoing hyperscale expansions. Ideal for REI

headline: United States Data Center Database 2025 | Covering 1,121 Existing and 385 Upcoming Colocation Centers, Plus 152 Hyperscale Data Centers Across 50 States
summary: Explore the comprehensive USA data center market portfolio analysis. headline: Equinix (EQIX): Examining Valuation After Recent Share Price Decline
summary: If you’re holding Equinix (EQIX) or considering it for your portfolio, you might have noticed that the data center leader’s stock has been drawing attention following a stretch of softer returns. While there has been no single headline-grabbing event, the recent price action, marked by a near 18% decline year-to-date, has some investors wondering if a new narrative is emerging for EQIX. The move is not tied to artificial intelligence trends or sudden operational shifts. Still, when a...
